message:
以没好友的马甲访问 http://bgm.tv/timeline?type=replies 的时候……



Chobits Said: MySQL Query Error

User: 15390
Time: 2011-2-7 3:13am
Script: /router.php

SQL: SELECT * FROM *
WHERE
ORDER BY * DESC LIMIT 20
Error: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '*' at line 3
Errno.: 1064

An error report has been dispatched to our administrator.
title: [Fixed] SQL语句杯具了
